import React from "react"; import { useState, useEffect } from "react"; const Specialization = () => { const [disease, setDisease] = useState([]); useEffect(() => { fetch("/contents/disease") .then((response) => response.json()) .then((Diseases) => { setProducts(Diseases); }); }, []); const diseases = [ "Leuciherrea", "Pcod", "Anxiety phycosis", "Foot corns", "Acidity, gastritis( heart burn)", "Adult constipation", "Foot sweat", "Foul body odour", "Blemishes", "Chronic mouth ulcers( apthus ulcer)", "Chronic tonsilitis", "Adenoids", "Fatty liver", ]; const diseaseImg = [ "leuciherrea", "pcod", "anxiety", "footcorn", "acidity", "gastritis", "adultConstipation", "footSweat", "foulBodyOdour", "blemishes", "chronicMouthUlcers", "chronicTonsilitis", "adenoids", "fattyLiver", ]; return (

Expertise

Our Specialization

{Diseases.map((disease) => (
{disease}
))}

); }; export default Specialization;
